item.title: [PI] ::update countdown command
item.dc:creator: @Liam_Baby Liam Baby
item.description:
@Liam_Baby wrote:

in game, type

::update 10

10 = 10 seconds for the count down
so change 10 to however long you want

item.title: [PI] ::update countdown command
item.dc:creator: @dddylan98 dddylan98
item.description:
@dddylan98 wrote:

I have my ::update command, but I would like to make it count down, how could I do thisâ€¦

if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dylan")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
